July 21, 2011

Simplest cross-browser console.log() caller

Simply embed this function into global JS file and call log(argument) to print variable in the console.

function log(msg) {
    return; // comment this out to enable debugging
    if (window.console) {
        console.log(msg);
    } else {
        alert(msg);
    }
}

To get more powerful log(), please check Paul's blog.
